{{user singing orcs}} }} {{quote|It is ever so with the things that Men begin; there is a frost in Spring, or a blight in Summer, and they fail of their promise.|[[Gimli]], ''[[The Last Debate]]''}} Hi there! I'm '''Ederchil''', I'm 32 years old and from Groningen, The Netherlands (don't you call that [[Unquendor|Holland]]). The name Ederchil - I've been using it for a couple of years now - is a rough translation of my first name, Olof - "descendant of forefathers". ==Ederchil namespace== * [[User:Ederchil/Sandbox]] - my personal sandbox * [[User:Ederchil/Sandbox2]] - because one was not enough * [[User:Ederchil/Sandbox3]] - because I should really finish any of the above two * [[User:Ederchil/Templates]] - various test-templates * [[User:Ederchil/Orcs PiA]] * [[User:Ederchil/Sandbox4]] - '''Blank slate'''; or, ''I'm really getting fed up with IMDb'' * [[User:Ederchil/Full cast]] - a (not so) full cast of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]].
